abstract: With the holidays approaching, Warren E. Buffett has found a way to stock up on all the elf hats and reindeer paper plates anyone could ever need: by buying an 80-year-old retailer overflowing with them.
snippet: With the holidays approaching, Warren E. Buffett has found a way to stock up on all the elf hats and reindeer paper plates anyone could ever need: by buying an 80-year-old retailer overflowing with them.

headline.main: Berkshire to Buy Oriental Trading Company
headline.print_headline: Berkshire to Buy Retailer Of Arts and Crafts Wares

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
